overview: The body of the protagonist leaves her head and launches itself into another dimension, where, without the restrictions and constraints of the mind, arise a space for reveries and where fun and colours prevail. A humourous reflection on identity, on a fanciful escapism as a way to face and accept reality.

production_companies.name: University of the West of England, Bristol

tagline: Sometimes I remember that I should live more with my body
title: Corporealitis
